headline: No Wonder Jim Jordan Is Refusing To Cooperate With The Jan 6 Investigation
author: John Amato
sentences: Any comments that are sexist or in any other way deemed hateful by our staff will be deleted and constitute grounds for a ban from posting on the site.
When registering you will also be presented with the option to tie all your old Disqus comments to your new Insticator account.
Please refer to our Terms of Service (revised 3/17/2016) for information on our posting policy.
Please note that the ability to comment with a C&L site account is no longer available.
In order to comment you will need to create an Insticator account.

New Commenting System
Our comments are now powered by Insticator.
The process is quick and simple.
